properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM NEWS WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_NO , NEWS_TITLE , USER_ID , REGIST_DATE , NEWS_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NEWS_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM NEWS N JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = N.USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO NEWS ( NEWS_NO , NEWS_TITLE , NEWS_CONTENT , REGIST_DATE , USER_NO , NEWS_COUNT , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , 0 , 'Y' )
SELECT NEWS_NO , NEWS_TITLE , NEWS_CONTENT , USER_ID , REGIST_DATE , N.USER_NO , NEWS_COUNT , STATUS FROM NEWS N JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = N.USER_NO) WHERE NEWS_NO = ? AND N.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NEWS SET NEWS_COUNT = NEWS_COUNT + 1 WHERE NEWS_NO = ?
